title: George Rogers Clark National Historical Park: Levee Project
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Levee Project            Levee Project       Work will soon begin on both the Vincennes Levee and the Brevoort Levee to bring both up to U.S. Army Corps of Engineers standards. This project is set to begin soon and work is expected to be complete by early October. As a result of this project, the sidewalk that runs nearest to the Wabash River will be closed. For the duration of the project, handicap access from the visitor center to the memorial is available by parking in front of the Old Cathedral (St. Francis Xavier) Catholic Church.
